title: Crime Alert 12.04.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.04.18
description:
Saudi Arabia denied Crown Prince knew about murder of journalist. Nanny suffocates infant and hangs up on doctor dad trying to give life saving instructions. Parent of Abby Connor files lawsuit after daughter dies from poisoned drink.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
